name: Need for Synthol
description:
Need for Synthol is a really hardcore platformer that will make you sweat over the next level. The gameplay is old as the world, but the features of the game engine and style won't leave you indifferent: the game is made in black and white colors, which, combined with the peculiarities of physics, keeps you in suspense until the final whistle.
The protagonist got into trouble and is forced to get out as only he can. The difficult situation forced him to turn the wrong path. Now he steals synthol, but the debt is inexorably growing.

Features:
  • Fascinating plot with popular main character
  • True hardcore
  • 10 levels
  • Original black and white style that doesn't hurt your eyes
  • There are 3 bottles of synthol hidden on each level, find them all

Attention! The game can cause attacks of rage and aggression, but we assure you that all levels are passable!
